page.title: 16MOSSLEY MARKET
page.content: The market is held every Thursday, with a smaller market on Saturday, on the {Market Ground }on Stamford St., Top Mossley. It has been held in its present form for fourteen years. There is a great variety of stalls selling everything from food to furniture,household goods to clothing. About half of the stalls sell clothes, some specialise in one type of clothing, such as childrens, whilst others are more general. Only two stallholders have attended the market since it began. Most have been coming for less than five years. Most customers think the market is a good one with plenty of variety. The busiest times are lunchtime and late afternoon. Saturday is quiet as most traders then have stalls on Ashton-U-Lyne market.
